mangaName: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!!
alternativeNames: The Demon King's Daughter is Too Kind!!
魔王の娘は優しすぎる!!
author: Sakamoto Yuuya
description: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this…?
